itunes:title: Women & Men in the Word: New Testament Week 3 with Jo Saxton
title: Women & Men in the Word: New Testament Week 3 with Jo Saxton
description:
For our third week in Women & Men in the Word: New Testament, Raechel and Amanda are joined by author, speaker, and leadership coach Jo Saxton. Together the three discuss the stories of Mary Magdalene, John, Bartimaeus, the rich young ruler, and Zacchaeus, and how their lives were transformed by Jesus. Along the way, they chat about their favorite Bible characters, the difference between American and English bacon, and what it means to be a woman who champions other women in their love for the Word.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 3 of the She Reads Truth Women & Men in the Word: New Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Women & Men in the Word: New Testament collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 15% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15. June’s box will include our upcoming study Psalm 119: We Delight in Your Word.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/wmitwnt-week-3-with-jo-saxton/
